overview: Mr. Mark Leader is the Director of Marketing at Sloane Robinson Investment Management Limited. He joined Sloane Robinson in 2001 and is responsible for the overall development of business and the support of the clients. Previously, Mr. Leader was employed at Baring Asset Management. He had asset allocation responsibilities for specialist institutional clients and for their segregated and pooled fund business in Continental Europe. Mr. Leader holds an M.B.A. from Warwick … University.
